metadata.title: CVE-2024-27052 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: wifi:rtl8xxxu: add cancel_work_sync() for c2hcmd_work The workqueue might stillbe running, when the driver is stopped. To avoid a use-after-free, callcancel_work_sync() in rtl8xxxu_stop().
